comment: три солдата Чорда окружили male рабочего. Говорит один.

languages.text: "За нарушение комендантского часа полагается расстрел. Что, гнида, думал не узнает никто?"

traits.locale_text: "За нарушение коммендантского часа полагается расстрел. Что, гнида, думал не узнает никто?"

languages.text: "Violating curfew gets you in front of the firing squad. Did you think no one would find out, you nit?"
languages.original_text: "За нарушение комендантского часа полагается расстрел. Что, гнида, думал не узнает никто?"

traits.locale_text: "Violating curfew gets you in front of the firing squad. Did you think no one would find out, you nit?"
"Violating curfew gets you in front of the firing squad. Did you think no one would find out, you nit?"
"Violating curfew gets you in front of the firing squad. Did you think no one would find out, you nit?"
"Violating curfew gets you in front of the firing squad. Did you think no one would find out, you nit?"
"Violating curfew gets you in front of the firing squad. Did you think no one would find out, you nit?"
"Violating curfew gets you in front of the firing squad. Did you think no one would find out, you nit?"

languages.text: “谁违反宵禁，谁就会被枪毙。你这个蠢货，你以为没人会发现这种事情吗？”
languages.original_text: "Violating curfew gets you in front of the firing squad. Did you think no one would find out, you nit?"

traits.locale_text: “谁违反宵禁，谁就会被枪毙。你这个蠢货，你以为没人会发现这种事情吗？”

languages.text: 「夜間外出禁止令を破れば、銃殺処刑に連れていかれるぞ。どうせバレないとでも思っていたのか？この間抜けが」
languages.original_text: "Violating curfew gets you in front of the firing squad. Did you think no one would find out, you nit?"

traits.locale_text: 「夜間外出禁止令を破れば、銃殺処刑に連れていかれるぞ。どうせバレないとでも思っていたのか？この間抜けが」

languages.text: «Violar el toque de queda te coloca ante el pelotón de fusilamiento. ¿Creías que nadie se daría cuenta, imbécil?».
languages.original_text: "Violating curfew gets you in front of the firing squad. Did you think no one would find out, you nit?"

traits.locale_text: «Violar el toque de queda te coloca ante el pelotón de fusilamiento. ¿Creías que nadie se daría cuenta, imbécil?».

languages.text: "Wer gegen die Ausgangssperre verstößt, kommt vor ein Erschießungskommando. Habt Ihr gedacht, es findet niemand heraus, Ihr Dummkopf?"
languages.original_text: "Violating curfew gets you in front of the firing squad. Did you think no one would find out, you nit?"

traits.locale_text: "Wer gegen die Ausgangssperre verstößt, kommt vor ein Erschießungskommando. Habt Ihr gedacht, es findet niemand heraus, Ihr Dummkopf?"

languages.text: « Quiconque enfreint le couvre-feu a droit au peloton d'exécution. Tu croyais vraiment que personne ne s'en rendrait compte, imbécile ? »
languages.original_text: "Violating curfew gets you in front of the firing squad. Did you think no one would find out, you nit?"

traits.locale_text: « Quiconque enfreint le couvre-feu a droit au peloton d'exécution. Tu croyais vraiment que personne ne s'en rendrait compte, imbécile ? »

languages.text: "Sokağa çıkma yasağını ihlal etmek, idam mangasının karşısına çıkmak demektir. Kimsenin fark etmeyeceğini mi sandın seni yavşak?"
languages.original_text: "Violating curfew gets you in front of the firing squad. Did you think no one would find out, you nit?"
